DOC.brief_summary: Blood pressure meter model CH-609 was to be assessed against the standard mercury sphygmomanometer according to the protocol of the ANSI/AAMI SP-10.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Test Report for Blood Pressure Meter CH-609
DOC.criteria: 85 subjects with a wide range of blood pressure were selected. Subjects could be taking antihypertensive medication, but excluded in atrial fibrillation or with any sustained arrhythmia.
